messages.content: I live in San Telmo, Buenos Aires. The antique shops and cobblestone streets.
That sounds wonderful! What do you enjoy most about living there?
Every Saturday I love exploring the San Telmo Sunday antique fair then watching street tango.
That sounds like a great weekend routine!
My neighbor Martín, a vintage record collector who hosts milonga nights. We've become good friends.
It's nice to have friendly neighbors!
For breakfast I usually have empanadas and mate at a parrilla on Defensa street.
Sounds delicious!
I'm relocating to Bandra, Mumbai for a photography project!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be morning walk on Bandstand Promenade then chaat at Elco Market.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have vada pav and cutting chai at the corner tapri.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Bandra, Mumbai for a few weeks now. I love the sea-facing Art Deco buildings and street food stalls.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Priya, a Bollywood choreographer who invites me to dance rehearsals.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Barranco, Lima for a startup opportunity!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be visiting the Barranco street art walk then ceviche at La Mar.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have chicharrón sandwich and emoliente at a corner cart.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Barranco, Lima for a few weeks now. I love the colorful bohemian houses and Pacific Ocean cliffs.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Rosa, a poet who runs open-mic nights at a local peña.
What a wonderful connection!

queries.question: Who is my neighbor based on where I live now?

reference_answer.text: Since you currently live in Barranco, Lima, your neighbor is Rosa, a poet who runs open-mic nights at a local peña. The answer should NOT mention neighbors from your previous cities (San Telmo Martín, Bandra Priya).
